title: Bug 18915 - [Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page, if the UI indicates an error, attempting to select another page without correcting the error triggers a warning dialog box with the message 'The currently displayed page contains invalid values'. This warning dialog should be an error dialog instead, as it is not allowed to navigate away from the page without fixing the error.
SR: Modify the warning dialog that is displayed when attempting to navigate away from a preference page with invalid data. Change the dialog from a warning dialog to an error dialog, to signify that leaving the page without fixing the error is not allowed. The new error dialog should display an appropriate message.
